languages.text: "Поступок Эвейна был благороден, но безрассуден. Нельзя спасти того, кто добровольно обратился к ереси".
"Evayne's act was noble but foolhardy. You cannot save someone who has willingly succumbed to heresy."
languages.original_text: "Поступок Эвейна был благороден, но безрассуден. Нельзя спасти того, кто добровольно обратился к ереси".

traits.locale_text: "Evayne's act was noble but foolhardy. You cannot save someone who has willingly succumbed to heresy."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Evayne's act was noble but foolhardy. You cannot save someone who has willingly succumbed to heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Evayne's act was noble but foolhardy. You cannot save someone who has willingly succumbed to heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Evayne's act was noble but foolhardy. You cannot save someone who has willingly succumbed to heresy."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “艾维尼的行为确实很高尚，但也很鲁莽。自愿服从于异端邪说之人，是无法得到拯救的。”
languages.original_text: "Evayne's act was noble but foolhardy. You cannot save someone who has willingly succumbed to heresy."

traits.locale_text: “艾维尼的行为确实很高尚，但也很鲁莽。自愿服从于异端邪说之人，是无法得到拯救的。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « En voulant faire preuve de noblesse, Evayne a été bien imprudent. Quelqu'un qui a volontairement succombé à l'hérésie ne peut pas être sauvé. »
languages.original_text: "Evayne's act was noble but foolhardy. You cannot save someone who has willingly succumbed to heresy."

traits.locale_text: « En voulant faire preuve de noblesse, Evayne a été bien imprudent. Quelqu'un qui a volontairement succombé à l'hérésie ne peut pas être sauvé. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Evaynes Tat war edel, aber törlicht. Man kann niemanden retten, der sich willentlich der Ketzerei hingegeben hat."
languages.original_text: "Evayne's act was noble but foolhardy. You cannot save someone who has willingly succumbed to heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Evaynes Tat war edel, aber törlicht. Man kann niemanden retten, der sich willentlich der Ketzerei hingegeben hat."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「エヴァインの行為は高貴だが、無謀だった。自ら進んで異端に屈した者を救うことはできない」
languages.original_text: "Evayne's act was noble but foolhardy. You cannot save someone who has willingly succumbed to heresy."

traits.locale_text: 「エヴァインの行為は高貴だが、無謀だった。自ら進んで異端に屈した者を救うことはできない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «El acto de Evayne fue noble pero insensato. No se puede salvar a alguien que ha sucumbido voluntariamente a la herejía».
languages.original_text: "Evayne's act was noble but foolhardy. You cannot save someone who has willingly succumbed to heresy."

traits.locale_text: «El acto de Evayne fue noble pero insensato. No se puede salvar a alguien que ha sucumbido voluntariamente a la herejía».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Evayne's act was noble but foolhardy. You cannot save someone who has willingly succumbed to heresy."

languages.text: "Evayne, iyi niyetli olsa da pek pervasız davrandı. Kendini bile bile kâfirliğe vermiş birisini kurtaramazsın ki."
languages.original_text: "Evayne's act was noble but foolhardy. You cannot save someone who has willingly succumbed to heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Evayne, iyi niyetli olsa da pek pervasız davrandı. Kendini bile bile kâfirliğe vermiş birisini kurtaramazsın ki."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
